compliant.section: 我們會與這些中間機構分享資料，包括廣告或裝置識別碼、已雜湊電子郵件地址、大略位置、目前的行程或訂單資訊，以及廣告互動資料，以進行其服務，並用於其隱私權聲明中所揭露之其他目的。使用者可在此處退出 Uber App 的個人化廣告服務。若要退出 Uber Eats App 的個人化廣告服務，請前往此處。如需詳細瞭解這些中間機構的隱私做法，包括如何向其提交處理其個人資料的要求，請參閱上方連結的隱私權聲明。
研究合作夥伴，包括與 Uber 合作、代表 Uber 調查或研究專案的合作夥伴。
協助 Uber 強化 Uber App 和服務之安全防護的服務供應商。
提供我們人工智慧和機器學習工具與服務的服務供應商。
顧問公司、律師、會計師和其他專業服務供應商。
保險公司，處理使用者提出或回報之 Uber 服務相關保險索賠，以及調整或處理保險索賠之用。
腳踏車和滑板車 (可透過 Uber App 租賃) 供應商，例如 Lime 和 Tembici。
第三方車輛供應商，包括合作車隊和租賃車行。
Uber 認為適用法律、規範、營業執照、協議、保單、法律程序或政府要求，或出於安全或類似疑慮而應適當揭露此類資訊時，Uber 得分享使用者的資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Legal obligation, Legitimate interests, Transparency, Information

non_compliant.section: 我們會與這些中間機構分享資料，包括廣告或裝置識別碼、已雜湊電子郵件地址、大略位置、目前的行程或訂單資訊，以及廣告互動資料，以進行其服務，並用於其隱私權聲明中所揭露之其他目的。使用者可在此處退出 Uber App 的個人化廣告服務。若要退出 Uber Eats App 的個人化廣告服務，請前往此處。如需詳細瞭解這些中間機構的隱私做法，包括如何向其提交處理其個人資料的要求，請參閱上方連結的隱私權聲明。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the third-party intermediaries, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: 研究合作夥伴，包括與 Uber 合作、代表 Uber 調查或研究專案的合作夥伴。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the research partners, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: 協助 Uber 強化 Uber App 和服務之安全防護的服務供應商。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the service providers, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: 提供我們人工智慧和機器學習工具與服務的服務供應商。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the service providers, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: 顧問公司、律師、會計師和其他專業服務供應商。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the professional service providers, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the insurance and loan partners, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: 保險公司，處理使用者提出或回報之 Uber 服務相關保險索賠，以及調整或處理保險索賠之用。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the insurance companies, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the airports, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: 腳踏車和滑板車 (可透過 Uber App 租賃) 供應商，例如 Lime 和 Tembici。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the bike and scooter providers, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: 第三方車輛供應商，包括合作車隊和租賃車行。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out by the third-party vehicle providers, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.

non_compliant.section: Uber 認為適用法律、規範、營業執照、協議、保單、法律程序或政府要求，或出於安全或類似疑慮而應適當揭露此類資訊時，Uber 得分享使用者的資料。
non_compliant.amend: Uber should provide a clear and concise description of the data processing activities carried out in these situations, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, and the legal basis for the processing.
